Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Alglenweis]{Alglenweis}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Anubis]{Anubis}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ashava]{Ashava}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Charon]{Charon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Luhar]{Luhar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pharasma]{Pharasma}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ravithra]{Ravithra}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Tsukiyo]{Tsukiyo}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Zyphus]{Zyphus}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Eject Soul]{Eject Soul}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ectoplasmic Interstice]{Ectoplasmic Interstice}

You wield power over the spiritual.
name: Soul Domain
